name: Claiming
description: Yes, there is indeed claiming. No, it is not FTB Chunks, because that's lame and I don't want to be a normie.$(br2)It's really not that hard to use, and $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://www.patreon.com/antibang)here's a link to Flan's wiki$() if it is not explained well enough here.
